Specimen Type: Respiratory specimens (sputum, bronchial wash, bronchoalveolar lavage), tissue samples, water samples, environmental swabs
Purpose: To culture and identify Legionella species in clinical and environmental specimens for accurate detection and timely reporting.
Equipment: Biosafety cabinet, incubator (35–37 °C), Buffered Charcoal Yeast Extract agar, centrifuge, microscopes, Legionella latex agglutination or DFA kit
